duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the day-to-day operations of the Patient Access department, including staff scheduling and employee performance.
Exercise discretionary judgment in solving problems and working with employees.
Use working knowledge of applicable regulations, laws, and techniques in hospital patient access and bed control.

education_certification.credential: Two years of revenue cycle, clinic, or hospital patient access experience required; one year of patient access lead experience may be substituted for the two years of general experience. Experience with EPIC or similar electronic medical record required. Working knowledge of applicable regulations, laws and techniques required.
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
